audioText: L'artiste peintre a été officiellement reconnue comme l'une des figures les plus influentes de l'art contemporain par les critiques internationaux.
question: How was the painter artist officially recognized?
options: As one of the most influential figures in contemporary art by international critics
As the winner of the prestigious national painting competition
As the youngest artist ever exhibited in major museums
As the creator of the most expensive artwork sold this year
explanation: The text states 'L'artiste peintre a été officiellement reconnue comme l'une des figures les plus influentes de l'art contemporain par les critiques internationaux.' - The painter artist was officially recognized as one of the most influential figures in contemporary art by international critics. 'Reconnue' is the feminine past participle of 'reconnaître' (to recognize).
